original_title: أشد الشخصيات شرا في عالم القصص - الجزء الثاني
overview: The video contains TOP 32 characters, which scored the highest scores in the scale of evil and quality in construction and storytelling, by examining and measuring more than 134 characters, nominated by dear followers, and all of this from the nominations of Planet B 612 team  The video material is not an ordinary top. The degree of scrutiny and measurement is given by an academic and a useful resource for all specialists in the field of art and story writing, as well as for the in-depth followers of the dear audience and the lover of the arts of animation, animation and novels
title: The most evil characters in the world of stories - Part Two
